name: CubeSpace (HyproX)
description:
CubeSpace

Hi, I'm experienced game developer but this is my first personal game. I'm trying to fund for myself to be indie. Also I need review about this game before releasing on Steam.

I made total 27 level for now and included all of it.

The game's logic is simple: Sweep the cube and try to find the exit portal. 

Thank you for your support!
